job_desc: Native English speaker, college graduate, highly motivated and diligent. Job requires working part-/full-time in Taipei (5 min. from Taipei MRT Liu-Chang-Li Station) with the possibility of relocating to Orange County, CA, U.S.A. (must have legal working permit). Good communication and writing skills to create correspondences and advertisements. Technical background preferred or previous work experience with or basic understanding of burglar security products. Applicant should be able to speak some basic Chinese.
